definition: away from the correct or expected course, not functioning properly
details:
adverb
- away from the correct or expected course
= example: away from the correct or expected course
= synonyms: amiss
- turned or twisted to one side
= synonyms: askew, skew-whiff
adjective
- not functioning properly
= synonyms: amiss
- turned or twisted toward one side
= synonyms: askew
